name: @hyperlinkgroup/blower
description: A modern frontend framework for modern browsers

scripts.watch: sass --watch scss/blower.scss dist/css/blower.css && npm run watchAutoprefixer
scripts.build: sass scss/blower.scss dist/css/blower.css && postcss dist/css/*.css --dir dist/css/ --use autoprefixer
scripts.prod: sass --no-source-map scss/blower.scss dist/css/blower.css && sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scss/blower.scss dist/css/blower.min.css && postcss dist/css/*.css --dir dist/css/ --use autoprefixer --no-map

author: HYPERLINK Group
